attributes.action: Change the logo of the 2012 Olympics as the one revealed on June the 4th is universally disliked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "jagged" logo which was unveiled on June the 4th for the 2012 Olympics has generated a tide of disdain and revulsion.  Many people have claimed that they cannot even discern the 2012 in the logo.  It is vital that the Olympics are properly branded and the lack of consultation on this has led to a poor design being chosen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
